messages.name: Maeve
messages.message: Thanks for helping out at the shop on such sort notice. It shouldn't be to bad. Just find the ingredients to make each days order. At least make sure to get a batch of cupcakes done each day. Some cupcakes are better than no cupcakes. Thanks again for the help. I'll leave you another message if I think of any tips for you. See you in a week.

messages.name: Spencer
messages.message: I'm throwing a party for my nephew this tomorrow and he just wants some normal cupcakes. Just some normal vanilla cupcakes will do. I'll swing by tonight to pick them up.
